production.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.'
production.post-deploy: npm install ; grunt compile ; pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.json --env production

web.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.';
web.post-deploy: npm i ; grunt compile --sites=engagement-lab-home,boston-civic-media ; pm2 restart server.js -- engagement-lab-home,boston-civic-media --env staging

staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.'
staging.post-deploy: npm i ; cd /srv/website/current/ ; pm2 restart server.js -- engagement-lab-home,boston-civic-media --env staging
